decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Flood Risk Assessment, Received: 16/02/2017. EX00, EX01, EX02, EX03, EX04, EX05, EX06, EX07, P01, P02, P03, P04, P05, P06, P07, P07, Received: 16/03/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of an additional floor with roof windows to front and rear elevation, erection of a front bay window to the ground and first floor level and erection of rear extensions to the house.
